text:
>> TONIGHT, IT'S THE SHOCKING
CONCLUSION OF

"THE BACHELORETTE."
>> LOVE IS THE CLOSEST THING TO

MAGIC THERE IS.
>> HANNAH'S JOURNEY TO FIND LOVE

IS ABOUT TO COME TO AN EMOTIONAL
END.

>> THIS WEEK HAS BEEN THE
HARDEST DECISION OF MY LIFE.

>> HANNAH IS IN LOVE WITH TYLER.
>> HANNAH IS LOUD AND PROUD, AND

THAT'S WHAT THIS IS RIGHT HERE.
>> AND JED.

>> WE HAVE BEEN A CONSTANT, ABLE
TO COME BACK TO WHERE WE STARTED

NO MATTER WHAT.
>> AND TONIGHT, HANNAH MUST

CHOOSE.
>> I CAN'T DO THIS.

I --
CAN YOU STOP THE CAR?

[GRUNTS]
I REALLY CAN'T DO THIS.

HOW WOULD YOU EVER BE READY TO
BE ENGAGED?

LIKE -- LIKE, WHAT?
LIKE, I'VE BEEN DOING ALL THE

FREAKING STEPS AND, LIKE, KNOW
WHAT I WANT.

>> THE EMOTIONAL AND SHOCKING
CONCLUSION OF "THE BACHELORETTE"

IS ABOUT TO BEGIN.
>> I DON'T KNOW IF I WANT THIS.

I DON'T KNOW.
>> IT'S LIVE AND IT ALL STARTS

RIGHT NOW.
THANK YOU.

HELLO, BACHELOR NATION, I'M
CHRIS HARRISON.

WELCOME TO THE DRAMATIC LIVE
FINALE OF "THE BACHELORETTE."

TWO MAN, TYLER AND JED, ARE
TOTALLY IN LOVE WITH HANNAH, AND

THEY ARE READY TO PROPOSE TO
HER, BUT THE SHOCKING CONCLUSION

TO HANNAH'S JOURNEY TO FIND LOVE
IS ONE THAT NOBODY COULD HAVE

SEEN COMING, NOT HANNAH, NOT
EVEN ME.

TONIGHT, WE'LL WITNESS GREAT
LOVE, INCREDIBLE TRUST, AND

UNFORTUNATELY, THE MASSIVE
DESTRUCTIVE FORCES OF LIES AND

BETRAYAL.
WE'LL ALSO SEE A PROPOSAL THAT,

IN RETROSPECT, CAN ONLY BE
DESCRIBED AS CRINGEWORTHY.

I HOPE YOU'RE READY, BACHELOR
NATION, BECAUSE HERE WE GO.

♪
>> IT'S A WEIRD FEELING THAT,

EVEN THOUGH IT IS THE END, THIS
FEELS A LOT LIKE THE FIRST NIGHT

BECAUSE I DON'T KNOW WHAT'S
NEXT, BUT I'M EXCITED.

SINCE THE BEGINNING, I HAVE
CHANGED.

I AM A DIFFERENT WOMAN.
YOU HAVE TO SHOW EVERY LAYER OF

YOU, THE GOOD AND THE BAD, TO
SOMEBODY, IF THEY'RE GOING TO

SPEND THE REST OF THEIR LIFE
WITH YOU, AND I SHOWED

EVERYTHING, AND IT FELT AMAZING.
LIKE, I FELT TRULY FREE.

JUST TO THINK OF THE GIRL I USED
TO BE, JUST A REALLY DEPENDENT

GIRL AND SAD ON THE INSIDE
BECAUSE -- NEEDED VALIDATION

FROM EVERYONE AND NEVER FELT
ENOUGH.

AND IT'S JUST -- TO HAVE, LIKE,
JUST A WHOLE DIFFERENT MIND-SET

OF WHO I AM AND WHAT I NEED IN
LIFE WHERE I DON'T NEED A MAN IN

MY LIFE BUT I WANT ONE TO
EXPERIENCE THE FULL LIFE THAT I

HAVE WITH ME.
THEY SAY THAT LOVE IS THE

CLOSEST THING TO MAGIC THERE IS.
I AM ONE OF THE LUCKY FEW THAT

GET TO EVER EXPERIENCE SOMETHING
SO MAGICAL.

THE UNKNOWN IS STILL THERE, BUT
I KNOW I HAVE SOMEBODY TO HOLD

MY HAND THROUGH IT.
♪

I HAVE BEEN FALLING IN LOVE WITH
BOTH TYLER AND JED THROUGH THIS.

I WAS HOPEFUL FOR LOVE; NOW I
KNOW THERE IS LOVE.

BUT IT IS SOMETHING THAT I AM
TAKING -- STILL TAKING A CHANCE,

BECAUSE MY FUTURE RELIES ON A
CHOICE THAT I MAKE.

>> HOW YOU DOING?
>> HI.

I'M NEIL LANE.
>> TYLER CAMERON.

>> NICE TO MEET YOU.
BIG DAY?

>> YES, HUGE DAY.
>> FROM THE VERY START, I WAS

DRAWN TO TYLER.
TYLER ALWAYS PUTS ME FIRST, AND

HE MAKES ME FEEL STRONG.
>> I DON'T KNOW, MAN, THIS IS

TOUGH.
HANNAH IS LOUD AND PROUD, AND --

AND THAT'S WHAT THIS IS RIGHT
HERE, YOU KNOW?

>> WITH TYLER, I FEEL REALLY
SECURE THAT HE WOULD DO WHATEVER

IT TAKES TO HAVE A HAPPY LIFE
TOGETHER.

♪
WITH JED, HE'S ALWAYS BEEN

SOMEBODY THAT I COULD TALK TO
FOR HOURS AND HOURS AND BE SUPER

SILLY WITH BUT ALSO HAVE DEEP
CONVERSATIONS WITH.

>> THIS ONE ALMOST REPRESENTS
OUR LOVE MORE JUST BECAUSE OF

THE OVAL SHAPE.
IT'S KIND OF MORE OF A CONSTANT.

AND WE'VE BEEN A CONSTANT, ABLE
TO COME BACK TO WHERE WE STARTED

NO MATTER WHAT.
>> I FEEL LIKE JED IS AS HONEST

WITH ME AS I AM WITH HIM,
WHICH -- THAT'S WHAT YOU WANT IN

A LIFE PARTNER.
♪

WE'VE ALL, LIKE, HAD MOMENTS IN
OUR LIFE THAT HAVE REALLY

DEFINED US, AND THIS IS A
DEFINING MOMENT TRULY.

THE BEST THINGS IN LIFE ARE THE
HARDEST THINGS IN LIFE TOO, AND

THIS WEEK HAS BEEN THE HARDEST
DECISION OF MY LIFE.

♪
YOU KNOW, IT'S SO HARD, BECAUSE

THE LIFE WITH TYLER IS DIFFERENT
THAN JED, AND I AM CONFLICTED IN

MY HEART.
I WAS HOPEFUL THAT I WOULD HAVE

CLARITY, BUT, LIKE, TODAY,
LIKE...

[SIGHS]
I DON'T KNOW.

I DON'T WANT TO NOT BE 100% SURE
AND THEN MAKE THE WRONG

DECISION.
♪

MM-MM.
I CAN'T DO THIS.

I --
CAN YOU STOP THE CAR?

WILL YOU PLEASE STOP THE CAR?
[GRUNTS]

[LAUGHING]
I REALLY CAN'T DO THIS.

THAT REALLY HURT.
>> ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?

>> NO, I'M NOT.
I JUST FREAKING --

>> IT'S JUST A BIG DAY.
>> THINK YOU CAN DO THIS?

>> YEAH.
[WHISTLES]

I'M READY.
♪

IT'S A WEIRD DAY.
IT'S A WEIRD FEELING, YOU KNOW,

KNOWING THAT SOMETHING'S ENDING
TODAY, BUT SOMETHING'S BEGINNING

TODAY.
I'M SO EXCITED ABOUT TODAY AND

WHAT MY FUTURE'S GOING TO LOOK
LIKE, BUT I DO HAVE TO CLOSE THE

DOOR TO THE PAST.
IT'S HEARTBREAKING.

♪
JED AND TYLER HAVE PIECES OF MY

HEART, AND I DON'T KNOW HOW I
TELL SOMEBODY TODAY THAT THEY'RE

NOT ENOUGH, BECAUSE THAT'S NOT
TRUE.

THERE'S REALLY NO GOOD WAY TO
SAY THAT TO SOMEBODY.

THE MAN THAT I HAVE TO END
THINGS WITH TODAY IS NOT GOING

TO EXPECT IT.

>> TYLER.
>> CHRIS.

>> WELCOME.
>> THANK YOU.

>> HOW'RE YOU DOING?
>> DOING AMAZING.

>> HOW YOU FEELING?

THIS LOVE IS FOREVER RIGHT HERE.
EVERY TIME I TRY TO TALK ABOUT

IT, I JUST LOSE MY WORDS AND I
GET ALL CHEESY AND GOOFY, AND

HERE I GO AGAIN.
BUT I LOOK INTO HER EYES, I FEEL

SO CONFIDENT AND I CAN TAKE ON

THE FUTURE HOLDS FOR US A LOVE

I'M DOWN FOR IT.

LIFE.

THE WOMAN OF MY DREAMS.
YOU LOOK ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS.

HEY.

>> HOW ARE YOU?

[SIGHS]

>> IT'S SO CRAZY WE'RE HERE,
RIGHT?

>> I KNOW.
WE HAVE LITERALLY REACHED THE

PEAK OF OUR JOURNEY.

>> HANNAH BROWN, FROM THE MOMENT
I MET YOU, YOU'VE CAPTIVATED MY

SOUL.

TO BE, AND I KNEW I WOULD GET
THERE ONE DAY, BUT I DIDN'T KNOW

HOW.
AND THEN I MET YOU.

I REALIZED THE MAN I WAS MEANT
TO BE TOOK YOU TO PUSH ME TO GET

THERE.
I HAVE GROWN SO MUCH

EMOTIONALLY, SPIRITUALLY, AND SO
MADLY IN LOVE.

I KNOW OUR LOVE WAS SLOW TO
START, BUT IT IS A LIGHT THAT

WILL BURN FOREVER, JUST LIKE THE
LIGHTHOUSE WE MET UNDER IN

JUPITER, FLORIDA.
I STARTED FALLING IN LOVE WITH

YOU THE FIRST MOMENT I GOT TO
HOLD YOU AND DANCE WITH YOU AND

HAVE YOU IN MY ARMS ON OUR FIRST
DATE.

>> TYLER...
>> THIS ISN'T IT.

>> [EXHALES SLOWLY]
JUST -- JUST --

I AM SO LUCKY TO BE LOVED BY YOU
AND TO FEEL THAT.

YOU HAVE SUPPORTED ME.
YOU HAVE BEEN SO SWEET AND

STRONG FOR ME AND DONE
EVERYTHING THAT I'VE ASKED AND

MORE AND LOVED ME SO MUCH.
AND MY LIFE WITH YOU WOULD BE...

AMAZING.
AND WHEN I TOLD YOU I WAS

FALLING IN LOVE WITH YOU, I MEAN
IT.

BUT I LOVE SOMEONE ELSE.
I'M SO SORRY.

I DON'T...
>> IT'S GOING TO HURT, BUT I'M

STILL GOING TO BE YOUR BIGGEST
FAN ROOTING FOR YOU.

I WISH YOU AND JED NOTHING BUT
SUCCESS.

I REALLY MEAN THAT.
♪

>> I WISH YOU A PERFECT SUCCESS

YOU GUYS WILL BE GREAT.

[INDISTINCT]
THANK YOU.

>> THANK YOU.

I THOUGHT THIS WAS IT.
IT FEELS LIKE A MILLION

UPPERCUTS TO THE GUT RIGHT NOW.
I'VE NEVER BEEN ONE TO BE ABLE

HANNAH TO PULL IT OUT OF ME.

AND I REALIZED ONCE IT WAS OUT
OF ME HOW AMAZING IT FEELS TO BE

OPEN.
AND -- AND I JUST -- THESE

FEELINGS THAT I'VE HAD, LIKE, I
HAVEN'T HAD FOR ANYONE THIS

STRONG, YOU KNOW?
I'M HURT.

I THOUGHT IT WAS HANNAH, BUT
THAT'S NOT THE CASE.

[APPLAUSE]

I KNOW THERE ARE A LOT OF TYLER

TONIGHT WHO ARE DEVASTATED BY
WHAT JUST HAPPENED, AND I'M SURE

THE SAME AT HOME.
TYLER IS GOING TO JOIN YOU HERE

ON STAGE A LITTLE BIT LATER
WHERE HE WILL SEE HANNAH FOR THE

FIRST TIME SINCE THAT HEARTBREAK
AND GOODBYE.

BUT BEFORE WE GET TO THAT,
HANNAH IS NOW LEFT WITH ONE MAN,

AT JED.
HOW THE HILL HER STORY END?

CAN JED GIVE HANNAH THE LOVE AND
TRUST SHE NEEDS AND A HUSBAND?

WE'LL FIND OUT NEXT.

THAT I BROKE TYLER'S HEART
TODAY.

I HOPE TYLER FORGIVES ME AND

JUST BE MYSELF.
AS HARD AS THAT WAS, TODAY I

HAVE CLARITY.
I PRAYED FOR PEACE TODAY FOR MY

DECISION AND MY FUTURE.
I'VE BEEN WAITING MY WHOLE LIFE

TO HAVE MY HAPPY ENDING.

IT JUST ALL KIND OF HIT ME, HOW

THIS IS THE BIGGEST DAY OF MY
LIFE.

HERE IS FOR SURE, AND I KNOW
THAT I LOVE YOU.

AND TALKING IS HARD SOMETIMES
FOR ME, SO...

YOU KNOW, I'VE ALWAYS PRAYED FOR

HAS ALLOWED THINGS TO HAPPEN IN

STRUGGLE THE WAY I'VE STRUGGLED

AND HAD THE HEARTBREAKS I'VE HAD
AND WHY THIS WAS MY JOURNEY.

THERE WERE SO MANY TIMES IN MY
LIFE WHERE I THOUGHT THAT IT

WOULD BE IT AND IT WASN'T, AND I
DIDN'T UNDERSTAND WHY.

BUT IT'S LED ME TO THIS MOMENT.
IT'S LED ME TO YOU.

I'VE BEEN PRAYING FOR THIS
MOMENT FOR A LONG TIME.

I'VE BEEN PRAYING FOR YOU.
YOU'VE SUPPORTED ME.

YOU'VE LOVED ME.
YOU'VE CHALLENGED ME.

YOU'VE MOVED ME.
AND IT'S MADE ME LOVE YOU SO, SO

MUCH.
AND I AM IN COMPLETE LOVE WITH

YOU.
I LOVE YOU, JED WYATT.

LIFE WITHOUT YOU, AND I DON'T

HANNAH...

EXCITED.

THE FIRST THOUGHT THAT WENT
THROUGH MY HEAD WAS, THIS IS IT.

HE IS SO REAL WITH ME AND I'M

WHAT I WANTED FROM THE VERY
START.

JED AND I HAVE HAD SOME REALLY
GREAT TIMES.

WE'VE HAD SILLY DANCE PARTIES.
WE PLAYED STUPID GAMES.

I MEAN, STUPID FUN STUFF THAT I
NEED IN A RELATIONSHIP.

I CAME ON THE SHOW HOPING TO
FIND LOVE AND WANTING TO SPEND

MY LIFE WITH SOMEONE, AND WITH
JED, I WAS SO HAPPY BECAUSE I

THOUGHT I WAS GETTING THIS
PERSON THAT I CAN SPEND LIFE

WITH WHO WAS SWEET AND SINCERE
AND HONEST.

AND...
THAT'S NOT BEEN THE CASE.

THE SECOND NIGHT AFTER WE GOT
ENGAGED, JED TELLS ME THAT HE

HAD BEEN HANGING OUT WITH THIS
GIRL BEFORE HE LEFT TO COME TO

THE SHOW.
AND I WAS LIKE, "WHEN WAS THIS?"

AND I REMEMBER HIM SAYING,
"A WEEK BEFORE THE SHOW."

AND I WAS LIKE, "OKAY, SO YOU
BROKE IT OFF?"

HE SAID YES.
HE TOLD ME IT WAS NOTHING.

IT WAS HARD TO HEAR, BUT I TRIED
TO LET THAT GO.

AND THEN A FEW WEEKS LATER, I
GET NEWS THAT THERE WAS A

"PEOPLE" MAGAZINE ARTICLE THAT
WAS OUT, AND I START READING IT,

AND IT WAS NOT THE SAME STORY
THAT I WAS TOLD.

THE ARTICLE SAID THAT HE DIDN'T
REALLY END THE RELATIONSHIP

BEFORE HE CAME HERE.
THE EXTENT OF THAT AND WHAT WAS

WITHHELD FROM ME AFTER I'VE
ALREADY SAID YES IS NOT OKAY.

JED HAS MUDDIED THE WATERS OF
OUR FUTURE TOGETHER, AND IT'S

NOT WHAT I THOUGHT I SAID YES
TO.

♪
